content: Getting rid of page.kind has broken all of my IGs. I can no longer distinguish between "HTML content-only" pages and "generated" pages. And I need to do that because I generate templates for the HTML content-only pages, but not for the generated pages. For now, I'm going to define an extension and put back the necessary logic in the IGPublisher.
well, it was you that proposed to get rid of it. It was painful for me too
